structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Powers and duties of board -- Authority for administrative regulations.

text.section: The board shall promulgate administrative regulations to administer, coordinate, and enforce the provisions of KRS 198B.650 to 198B.689; conduct examinations; maintain a list of all licensees and certificate holders; keep minutes of board meetings and a record of its proceedings; and register and keep records of all apprentices.

The board, or its designee, may issue subpoenas, administer oaths, examine witnesses, conduct disciplinary proceedings, investigate allegations of wrongdoing under KRS 198B.650 to 198B.689, issue licenses and certificates, and seek injunctive relief to enforce the provisions of KRS 198B.650 to 198B.689. In seeking injunctive relief, the board shall not be required to post any bond.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.
